original_sentence: - P L_{b, f, c}\left(q_{d}\right) is a downlink pathloss estimate in dB calculated by the UE using reference signal (RS) index q_{d} for the active DL BWP, as described in clause 12 , of carrier f of serving cell c - If the UE is not provided PUSCH-PathlossReferenceRS and enableDefaultBeamPL-ForSRS, or before the UE is provided dedicated higher layer parameters, the UE calculates P L_{b, f, c}\left(q_{d}\right) using a RS resource from an SS/PBCH block with same SS/PBCH block index as the one the UE uses to obtain MIB
